description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Stockholm 2016
http://gotosthlm.com

David Montag - Field Engineering Manager at Neo Technology

ABSTRACT
We'll explore how a graph database like Neo4j can help manage the complexities of modern infrastructure. Existing tools do this to a certain [...]
